channel.title: OAP shoplifter lacks bite
channel.description:
[b]OAP shoplifter lacks bite[/b]
A 70-year-old shoplifter tried to evade capture by biting an arresting officer before realising he'd left his dentures at home. Pensioner Gustav Ernegger turned on the policeman when he grabbed him as he ran out of a clothes shop in Braunschweig, Germany, after stealing a shirt. But instead of sinking his teeth into the officer's arm, he was only able to leave a wet mark from his gums. Police spokesman Gunther Brauner said: "He tried to bite the officer several times, but had forgotten to put his false teeth in and so was unable to cause him any harm."
Source (Not sauce) : http://www.ananova.com/news/story/sm_1879388.html?menu=news.quirkies.strangecrime This is an old story but deserves to be read

item.title: OAP shoplifter lacks bite
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Gross…

This old bummy guy went into Canadian Tire and stole some shit, my friends that work there tried chasing him down but about 30ft away from the store he turned around and was like “I have AIDS, and I’m bleeding” (he was bleeding)… they just walked back to the store, lol.

item.title: OAP shoplifter lacks bite
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

might just be me but i find old people to be gross

would prefer to get bitten by a young guy, than gummed by an old guy
